reviews.customers_say: Customers love this dress's style, describing it as pretty and an interesting off-shoulder design, while also appreciating its great fit, quality, stretchiness, and comfort. The color receives positive feedback, with one customer noting how well black complements their body. Regarding size and sheerness, opinions are mixed - while some find it true to size and not see-through, others report it runs small and is a bit see-through. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I needed this dress like yesterday! â¤ï¸
items.body: I am so mad that I waited years to buy this dress, it's perfect! I love the way it looks on my body & accentuates my curves! It is sheer so I would suggest wearing dark under garments or wearing the same color as the dress. I love long dresses but because of my height they mostly stop at mid calf. This one comes to the top of my ankles. I could've gone down a size but I'll be doing a lot of moving around & don't want to feel restricted. It's stretchy but not loose. It's not going to keep you warm at all during this cold season. This dress will have you feeling like you are that girl baby. Don't keep hesitating, buy now, I recommend! Stay blessed ðŸ™ðŸ¾ Read more
items.author: Iloveshopping

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pink dress
items.body: The material is really good and super stretchy. It is a bit see-through, so I recommend wearing something black or suitable underneath. Overall, itâ€™s very cute and I loved it! Read more
items.author: Madelyn Marie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, Very Glamorous!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. The colour is exactly as the picture. The quality, very good and warm. Itâ€™s a see through but thick enough to cover your body. It fits perfectly. I got value for my money. I definitely gonna buy again. Read more
items.author: Ms. Judith

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Buy!!! Simple and nice.
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This item is so cute-and it is sexy!!!! The only issue I had is that I went by what size Amazon suggested which was a large but I should have ordered an extra large. Materials are nice and soft, if you like to dance you can get your twerk on. And itâ€™s gives all the neck action-it makes it sexy. It does look like the picture. I would suggest you to buy it. I love it-just now have to order an extra large. Read more
items.author: Cherish Her Craft

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars So Disappointed
items.body: Either the dress I received was mislabeled for its size or the dress runs extremely small. I am not sure which, but it's a no. The fabric stretches, however you have to size up quite a bit. I hope the dress I received was just the wrong labeled size. I am returning it and probably won't try a different size because I don't want to be disappointed again. Read more
items.author: L Low

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy the dress!
items.body: I love this dress! It is true to size, light weight, not too thick, comfortable, and simple. It has a little stretch to it. Not a lot but just enough. I received so many compliments! It is see through as Iâ€™m sure youâ€™ve read. So, you definitely have to have the right undergarments which can make it a bit sexier depending on what you wear. The material is like a nice soft texture, so be careful of the jewelry you wear too because it can snag. Wish I had a full body pic to show you. But, if you need something quick and cute, GET IT! Iâ€™ll most likely get another color. Read more
items.author: Kay

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Sizing is Off!
items.body: As much as I wanted to like this dress, I had to return it. I bought an extra large because Iâ€™m a size 14 and like to wear things a little loose. However, I could barely button the dress. It was very tight but if the fit was right it might look really nice, and like all the other reviews said it is see through. Read more
items.author: Deb W

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars GAPING BETWEEN BUTTONS WHEN SEATED
items.body: Sexy ruffled chiffon fabric in an interesting off-shoulder dress. I ordered one size up for my curvy size 14 figure, since it was a bodycon silhouette. The black colorway gave some more coverage to the thin fabric. I returned the dress due to the gaping between the buttons when seated, even though I had gone up a size. The fit was fine elsewhere. The sleeves are very long, hanging over the hands. The dress length is as shown online. Great club dress if one planned to stand all night or if your figure is not curvy. Returned. Read more
items.author: DestinTart

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Off Shoulder Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Off Shoulder Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 0279-blue, 0279-hot Pink, 0279-brown, 0279-green, 0279-red, 0279-khaki, 0279-black, 0279-white. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
